name: Dark Farm
description:
I used to be a warrior. Fighting and beating huge enemies. But i'm tired. I just want to retire. Enjoying a simple life, being a simple person. But something went wrong.
This is my life now...

"Dark Farm" is an RPG game. You have to take care of your garden, which wants to kill you. Grow killer vegetables. Water your garden beds. Defend yourself.


Features:
* Plant a plant.
* Take care of him.
* Kill the result.
* Try to survive.

Update soon!
